Name: require_team_status_active
Description: Only active teams are eligible for assignments

Name: require_worker_status_active
Description: Only active workers can be assigned

Name: require_user_story_status_todo
Description: Only 'To Do' user stories are assignable

Name: require_sprint_goal_achievement_pending
Description: Goal achievement status must be pending

Name: require_skill_certified
Description: Only certified skills are valid for role assignment

Name: require_role_area_defined
Description: Role must have a defined area of responsibility

Name: require_velocity_trend_positive
Description: Only teams with positive velocity trend are preferred

Name: require_release_plan_status_active
Description: Only active release plans are considered

Name: require_roadmap_milestones_defined
Description: All roadmaps must have milestones defined
